tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    pollutant_type VARCHAR,
    pollutant_level DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location TEXT,
  pollutant TEXT,
  concentration FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualityMeasurements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pollutant_name VARCHAR,
  pollutant_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualitySensorData (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    pollutant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    pollutant_level FLOAT NOT NULL
);
